job_title: Discharge Planning Assistant in Pleasanton, CA
pros: Experience working in a hospital setting, friendly co workers
cons: very fast pace, not paper less

pros: Nice people to work with at the bedside level.
cons: ICU manager doesn't manage but rather interferes. She is reactive not proactive. She has old, outdated ways of thinking. Poor staffing under her interpretation of what is safe for patients. The good news is I hear she is leaving.

pros: There used to be but valleycare has changed from the way it was when I started there.
cons: No bonuses or raises.  When issues arise management like to make it public with an department so retaliation occurs when taken to HR they do nothing about it.  They never tell you good job it's only focused on what you can fix. When I was with the company I had a 99% accuracy. They only brought up the 1% wrong. They tried to incorporate a process of recognition but it became pointless and meaningless when they said you couldn't get it more than once because they had to get it to everybody in the department. They teach their staff it is better to snitch on everyone than work as a team.  And they never back you up when there are complaints.

pros: Very nice to company to work for when it was ValleyCare, management was very easy to work with and supportive. Pay was good as well as the benefits. Loved working with patients and had wonderful coworkers.
cons: Due to the merge job was not secure and management seemed to take advantage of their employees.

review_title: This is a great company to work for!
job_title: Front Desk Attendant in Livermore, CA
pros: You have access to Lifestyle Rx a fantastic wellness center.
cons: They are going through a management transition, which can be stressful.

job_title: Customer Service Attendant in Pleasanton, CA
pros: Great coworkers, flexible hours, fun place to work.
cons: Hard to get in full time at an entry level per diem employee.

pros: If you don't cross them they won't cross you
cons: The administration suck and did not care
No team work. Horrible work environment.
